posts.post_content: I am looking for SGC/PSA (slight preference to SGC) graded T202s. Nice looking examples in grades 2-4 should fit what I'm looking for. Open to lower grades in more valuable examples. Willing to pay current market value prices.
I have Chance Shean, but it’s a 6.  Let me know if interested!

[quote name="dantrades63105" post=2418170]I have Chance Shean, but it’s a 6.  Let me know if interested![/QUOTE]
 I may have an interest in it if op doesn’t. Feel free to pm if that’s the case.
I have one that might be of interest. PM sent with details.
